snippet.title: Mizuki Shigeru no Youkai Butouden - Yukinko Story Mode Playthrough [Hardest] (PS1) (Longplay)
snippet.description:
Story Playthrough with Yukinko. Game Intro, Yukinko's Ending and Game Credits Included. Set on Hardest Difficulty. I love this Games Creativity and Music BUT there is very limited moves and Damn is the gameplay Clunky and Stiff like Youkai Hell.🤦‍♂️
📢Alright some Cool Trivia for you Warriors. According to Japanese Folklore 'Yukinko' was a Baby girl held in the Arms of her Mother 'Yuki Onba'.(Both Demon/Youkai) On Snowy and Dark Nights travelers would often encounter a Poor Woman Holding a baby in the middle of a forest who will then ask/beg the Man for help by holding her baby. IF the man decides to hold the baby she will freeze the man to his cool death and if he doesn't She will attack him to death anyway. The Freshly Doomed Man becomes a nice Dinner for the Mother and Child. 🍟🍔 So next Time you travel in to a Forest on a Dark and Snowy night, Make sure you carry that Sexy Ass Shotgun or a Master Sword!😈

Mizuki Shigeru no Yokai Butouden (水木しげるの妖怪武闘伝) is a Fighting video game published by KSS released on April 25th, 1997 for the Sony PlayStation.
A fighting game featuring different mythical Japanese beings ("yōkai"), designed by Gegege no Kitarō mangaka and yōkai expert Shigeru Mizuki.

😁SUPPORT A BROTHER BY DROPPING A LIKE ON THE VIDEO AND SUBSCRIBING
